name: Fallen Angel: Hell Survival
description:
Fallen Angel: Hell Survival is an open world sandbox First Person Survival Game. For reasons unknown to her, former Divine Angel, Hesicasial has been sent to hell with amnesia. All she can remember is her name, and now she must learn to survive her new ever changing magical prison. Scavenge, Mine, Hunt, Fight, Craft and Build yourself a base to protect you from the horrors that come at night.

When the game is finished, you will have a progressive means of gradually discovering a way to escape hell.
